channel.title: Ruler's bullshit
channel.description:
People have been spamming 999 different sites advertising great bots for each skill. These bots are just iBot with 1 script... Anyway, to further prove ruler is behind it, any whois on the sites will show nameservers being something like ns1.impsoft.biz.
Q: Why isn't he banned ??

item.title: Ruler's bullshit
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Yeah there is a lot of up to date top secret information that would certainly put us as risk if it was ever released to someone who doesn’t have 50 rep on this forum
Just saying, it’s not particularly difficult to get CM legitimately anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Ruler's bullshit
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Unhandled:

Why not give him CM back, his reactions are funny as shit.

Because he knowingly gave information within this section to a third party (despite the fact that this section is for super secret stuff that should not be posted elsewhere), and then he did it again at a later date after I’d asked him not to.

Read full topic

item.title: Ruler's bullshit
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:9, topic:291856”][quote author=GenoDemoN link=topic=385655.msg2939180#msg2939180 date=1251752343]

People have been spamming 999 different sites advertising great bots for each skill. These bots are just iBot with 1 script… Anyway, to further prove ruler is behind it, any whois on the sites will show nameservers being something like ns1.impsoft.biz.

Q: Why isn’t he banned ??

It is because he lets other people market and sell his bot for a portion of the profits, this was offered to me as well but I’m too busy to deal with people over MSN trying to sell ruler’s bot to make a few bucks, it seems like a legitimate way to make money though if you want to deal with the crap.

He doesn’t come here, but if he did we still have no reason to ban him.

Hey mopar, if you ever get time jsut gimmie a ring brother.

Eric wants to recover his account soemtime if you want to give him CM back.
[/quote]So for ruler to grace us with his presence once more, Mopar has to give his CM status back?[/quote]
Obviously so he can post more OMG I GOT DDOS’D I BET IT IS LAWL OR C|P topics.

Read full topic

item.title: Ruler's bullshit
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

No, I didn’t ban him and I have no intention of doing so. He knows the precise reasoning for my decision, and he was warned by me before I decided to revoke his access to the inside of this community.

He has boycotted this website on his own free will.

Read full topic
